nginx.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=NGINX Service
After=network.target

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run --name nginx-service-backend -p 8080:80 {{.ImageName}}
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop -t 10 nginx-service-backend
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman rm -f nginx-service-backend
Restart=always

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

cron.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=Cron Service
After=remote-fs.target

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run --name cron-service-backend -v /etc/cron.daily:/etc/cron.daily -v /etc/cron.weekly:/etc/cron.weekly -v /etc/cron.monthly:/etc/cron.monthly {{.ImageName}}
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop -t 10 cron-service-backend
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman rm -f cron-service-backend
Restart=always

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

packagekit.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=PackageKit Service
After=network.target

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run -it --name packagekit-service-backend --privileged --ipc=host --net=host --pid=host -e HOST=/host -v /run:/run -v /var/log:/var/log -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime -v /:/host -v /run/dbus/system_bus_socket:/run/dbus/system_bus_socket -v /tmp:/tmp {{.ImageName}}
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop -t 10 packagekit-service-backend
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman rm -f packagekit-service-backend
Restart=always

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

wpa_supplicant.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=Containerized WPA Supplicant Service
Requires=network.target dbus.service
After=network-pre.target dbus.service
Before=network.target shutdown.target

[Service]
Type=simple
Restart=always
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/podman stop wpa_supplicant_service
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/podman rm wpa_supplicant_service
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run --name wpa_supplicant_service \
  --privileged \
  --cap-add=NET_ADMIN \
  --cap-add=NET_RAW \
  --device /dev/net/tun \
  --network=host \
  --pid=host \
  --ipc=host \
  -v /run/dbus/system_bus_socket:/run/dbus/system_bus_socket \
  -v /etc/wpa_supplicant:/etc/wpa_supplicant:ro \
  -v /run/wpa_supplicant:/run/wpa_supplicant \
  -v /var/log/wpa_supplicant:/var/log/wpa_supplicant \
  -e HOST=/host \
  {{.ImageName}}

ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop wpa_supplicant_service
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman rm wpa_supplicant_service

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
